description: Slayer creature data with recommended locations. Per REQUIREMENTS.md Section 11.2.

creatures.name: Aberrant spectres
creatures.notes: Requires nose peg, slayer helmet, or face mask

locations.name: Catacombs of Kourend
locations.notes: Multi-combat, good for prayer training with bone drops

creatures.name: Banshees
creatures.notes: Requires earmuffs, slayer helmet, or masked earmuffs

creatures.name: Basilisks
creatures.notes: Requires mirror shield or V's shield. Basilisk Knights require 60 Slayer.

locations.name: Jormungand's Prison
locations.notes: Basilisk Knights - better drops but harder

creatures.name: Black dragons
creatures.notes: Anti-dragon shield or dragonfire protection required

creatures.name: Cave crawlers
creatures.notes: Can poison - bring antipoison

creatures.name: Cave horrors
creatures.notes: Requires witchwood icon. Drop black mask for slayer helm.

creatures.name: Cockatrice
creatures.notes: Requires mirror shield or V's shield

creatures.name: Dust devils
creatures.notes: Requires face mask, slayer helmet, or slayer helmet (i)

creatures.name: Drakes
creatures.notes: Requires boots of stone, granite boots, or brimstone boots to traverse Karuulm dungeon heated areas. Volcanic projectile attack leaves lingering flames - move to avoid.

creatures.name: Gargoyles
creatures.notes: Requires rock hammer to kill below 9 HP, or auto-smash unlock

creatures.name: Hydras
creatures.notes: Requires boots of stone, granite boots, or brimstone boots to traverse Karuulm dungeon heated areas. Can be poisoned. Alchemical Hydra boss is separate and not assigned as regular task.

creatures.name: Kurask
creatures.notes: Requires leaf-bladed weapons, broad bolts/arrows, or Magic Dart

creatures.name: Rockslugs
creatures.notes: Requires bag of salt to kill below 4 HP, or auto-kill unlock

creatures.name: Smoke devils
creatures.notes: Requires face mask or slayer helmet

creatures.name: Turoth
creatures.notes: Requires leaf-bladed weapons, broad bolts/arrows, or Magic Dart

creatures.name: Blue dragons
creatures.notes: Anti-dragon shield or dragonfire protection required

creatures.name: Green dragons
creatures.notes: Anti-dragon shield or dragonfire protection required. Wilderness locations are dangerous.

creatures.name: Skeletal wyverns
creatures.notes: Requires elemental shield, mind shield, or slayer helmet to protect from ice breath

creatures.name: Fossil Island wyverns
creatures.notes: Requires elemental shield, mind shield, or slayer helmet. Ancient Wyvern is the superior variant.

creatures.name: Spiritual creatures
creatures.notes: Found in God Wars Dungeon. Require appropriate god items for protection.

creatures.name: Suqahs
creatures.notes: Requires Lunar Diplomacy to access Lunar Isle

creatures.name: Waterfiends
creatures.notes: Good for crimson charm drops. Weak to ranged.

creatures.name: Aviansies
creatures.notes: Require ranged or magic to attack. Good for adamant bar drops.

creatures.name: Metal dragons
creatures.notes: Anti-dragon shield or dragonfire protection required. Extended breath attack.

creatures.name: Cave kraken
creatures.notes: Must be attacked with magic. Can only be killed on task.

creatures.name: Lizardmen
creatures.notes: Lizardman Shamans are dangerous - use safespots or high defence

creatures.name: Terror dogs
creatures.notes: Found in Tarn's Lair. Requires completion of Haunted Mine.

creatures.name: Mogres
creatures.notes: Use fishing explosives to spawn them at Mudskipper Point.

creatures.name: Wall beasts
creatures.notes: Emerge from cracks in the wall. Require a light source.

creatures.name: Molanisks
creatures.notes: Use Slayer bell to lure them from holes. Found in Dorgesh-Kaan South Dungeon.

creatures.name: Fever spiders
creatures.notes: Require slayer gloves to kill safely.

creatures.name: Goraks
creatures.notes: Found in Gorak Plane via Fairy ring DIR.

creatures.name: Warped creatures
creatures.notes: Found in Warped area. Warped tortoises and terrorbirds.

creatures.name: Mutated zygomites
creatures.notes: Use fungicide spray to finish below 7 HP.

creatures.name: Scarab mages
creatures.notes: Found in Sophanem Dungeon. Contact! quest required.

rockHammer.description: Used to finish gargoyles below 9 HP

bagOfSalt.description: Used to finish rockslugs below 4 HP

iceCoolers.description: Used to finish desert lizards below 4 HP

fungicideSpray.description: Used to finish zygomites below 7 HP

nosePeg.description: Prevents stat drain from aberrant spectres

mirrorShield.description: Prevents instant kill from basilisks and cockatrice

faceMask.description: Prevents stat drain from dust devils and smoke devils

witchwoodIcon.description: Prevents special attack from cave horrors

slayerHelmetImbued.description: Imbued slayer helmet with all protection and damage bonus
